channel.description: Recent content in About on Tonny Mutai

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there, i appreciate you stopping by, my name is Tony Mutai or lestoni if you prefer. I live in Nairobi, Kenya. I am a software engineer primarily specializing in designing and building of RESTFul API’s aka programming for the internets. The love for working with APIâ€™s stems from interest and enjoyment of working with web scale distributed and concurrent systems. I mostly code with NodeJS, Golang but i am working towards being a polyglot.

item.title: Hello Blogging
item.description: I guess this is the hello world for blogging. For a quick introduction of who i am check my about page. I started blogging-ish this year but slothed down a bit(Procastination is a habit and not good my friend). But with the ideas, lessons and what not i have picked along the way, i think its time i did something good and started writing. With this blog i hope we shall learn, share, and engage together.
